item.title: Need help with pking
item.dc:creator: @alexplt178 alexplt178
item.description:
@alexplt178 wrote:

Ctrl f search “if (deathStage == 1)” and look for somthing simular to this "// If killed apply dead
if (deathStage == 1) {
if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
} else if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { // by a player in
// wilderness -bakatool

			// Unequip all items -bakatool
			for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
				try {
					int item = playerEquipment[r];
					remove(item, r);
				} catch (Exception e) {
				}
			}

			// Drop all items -bakatool
			for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
				try {
					if (Item.itemStackable[playerItems[i] - 1]) { // stack
						// items
						// drop
						// all
						// -bakatool
						ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[i] - 1, absX, absY," and i think you can figure out the rest =)

Read full topic
